text:
@BBCPolitics She broke the rules and resigned.

#Cummings broke multiple rules, including returning to work when he thought his wife had coronavirus, then drove 260 miles to his second home before his ‘eye test’ drive. Actions for which he shows no remorse let alone resigns.
